    if n == 0 or n == 1 or n == 2:
        return 1
    dp = [-1 for _ in range(n + 1)]
    dp[0] = 1
    dp[1] = 1
    dp[2] = 1
    for i in range(3, n + 1):
        dp[i] = (dp[i - 2] + dp[i - 3]) % MOD
    return dp[n]
